Description: Online CRM and Email Marketing built by sales people for sales people.
Name: SalesNexus

Methods.Name: Get API Key
Methods.Description: Obtains a temporary API Key to be used for subsequent requests.

Methods.Name: List New Sales
Methods.Description: Lists sales created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Lists all contacts associated with the authenticated user.

Methods.Name: List New Contacts
Methods.Description: Lists contacts created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Lists contacts updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Gets all information associated with a contact.
